description: Lists all of the DataBrew jobs that are defined.

nested_items.name: Jobs
nested_items.description: A list of jobs that are defined.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the job.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user who created the job.

nested_items.name: CreateDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the job was created.

nested_items.name: DatasetName
nested_items.description: A dataset that the job is to process.

nested_items.name: EncryptionKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an encryption key that is used to protect the job output. For more information, see Encrypting data written by DataBrew jobs.

nested_items.name: EncryptionMode
nested_items.description: The encryption mode for the job, which can be one of the following:
SSE-KMS - Server-side encryption with keys managed by KMS.
SSE-S3 - Server-side encryption with keys managed by Amazon S3.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The unique name of the job.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The job type of the job, which must be one of the following:
PROFILE - A job to analyze a dataset, to determine its size, data types, data distribution, and more.
RECIPE - A job to apply one or more transformations to a dataset.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user who last modified the job.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The modification date and time of the job.

nested_items.name: LogSubscription
nested_items.description: The current status of Amazon CloudWatch logging for the job.

nested_items.name: MaxCapacity
nested_items.description: The maximum number of nodes that can be consumed when the job processes data.

nested_items.name: MaxRetries
nested_items.description: The maximum number of times to retry the job after a job run fails.

nested_items.name: Outputs
nested_items.description: One or more artifacts that represent output from running the job.

nested_items.name: CompressionFormat
nested_items.description: The compression algorithm used to compress the output text of the job.

nested_items.name: Format
nested_items.description: The data format of the output of the job.

nested_items.name: PartitionColumns
nested_items.description: The names of one or more partition columns for the output of the job.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Bucket
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket name.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The unique name of the object in the bucket.

nested_items.name: BucketOwner
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the bucket owner.

nested_items.name: Overwrite
nested_items.description: A value that, if true, means that any data in the location specified for output is overwritten with new output.

nested_items.name: FormatOptions
nested_items.description: Represents options that define how DataBrew formats job output files.

nested_items.name: Delimiter
nested_items.description: A single character that specifies the delimiter used to create CSV job output.

nested_items.name: MaxOutputFiles
nested_items.description: Maximum number of files to be generated by the job and written to the output folder. For output partitioned by column(s), the MaxOutputFiles value is the maximum number of files per partition.

nested_items.name: DataCatalogOutputs
nested_items.description: One or more artifacts that represent the Glue Data Catalog output from running the job.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Web Services account that holds the Data Catalog that stores the data.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of a database in the Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: The name of a table in the Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: S3Options
nested_items.description: Represents options that specify how and where DataBrew writes the Amazon S3 output generated by recipe jobs.

nested_items.name: Bucket
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket name.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The unique name of the object in the bucket.

nested_items.name: BucketOwner
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the bucket owner.

nested_items.name: DatabaseOptions
nested_items.description: Represents options that specify how and where DataBrew writes the database output generated by recipe jobs.

nested_items.name: TempDirectory
nested_items.description: Represents an Amazon S3 location (bucket name and object key) where DataBrew can store intermediate results.

nested_items.name: Bucket
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket name.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The unique name of the object in the bucket.

nested_items.name: BucketOwner
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the bucket owner.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: A prefix for the name of a table DataBrew will create in the database.

nested_items.name: Overwrite
nested_items.description: A value that, if true, means that any data in the location specified for output is overwritten with new output. Not supported with DatabaseOptions.

nested_items.name: DatabaseOutputs
nested_items.description: Represents a list of JDBC database output objects which defines the output destination for a DataBrew recipe job to write into.

nested_items.name: GlueConnectionName
nested_items.description: The Glue connection that stores the connection information for the target database.

nested_items.name: DatabaseOptions
nested_items.description: Represents options that specify how and where DataBrew writes the database output generated by recipe jobs.

nested_items.name: TempDirectory
nested_items.description: Represents an Amazon S3 location (bucket name and object key) where DataBrew can store intermediate results.

nested_items.name: Bucket
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket name.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The unique name of the object in the bucket.

nested_items.name: BucketOwner
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the bucket owner.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: A prefix for the name of a table DataBrew will create in the database.

nested_items.name: DatabaseOutputMode
nested_items.description: The output mode to write into the database. Currently supported option: NEW_TABLE.

nested_items.name: ProjectName
nested_items.description: The name of the project that the job is associated with.

nested_items.name: RecipeReference
nested_items.description: A set of steps that the job runs.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the recipe.

nested_items.name: RecipeVersion
nested_items.description: The identifier for the version for the recipe.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the job.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role to be assumed for this job.

nested_items.name: Timeout
nested_items.description: The job's timeout in minutes. A job that attempts to run longer than this timeout period ends with a status of TIMEOUT.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: JobSample
nested_items.description: A sample configuration for profile jobs only, which determines the number of rows on which the profile job is run. If a JobSample value isn't provided, the default value is used. The default value is CUSTOM_ROWS for the mode parameter and 20,000 for the size parameter.

nested_items.name: Mode
nested_items.description: A value that determines whether the profile job is run on the entire dataset or a specified number of rows. This value must be one of the following:
FULL_DATASET - The profile job is run on the entire dataset.
CUSTOM_ROWS - The profile job is run on the number of rows specified in the Size parameter.

nested_items.name: Size
nested_items.description: The Size parameter is only required when the mode is CUSTOM_ROWS. The profile job is run on the specified number of rows. The maximum value for size is Long.MAX_VALUE.

nested_items.name: ValidationConfigurations
nested_items.description: List of validation configurations that are applied to the profile job.

nested_items.name: RulesetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the ruleset to be validated in the profile job. The TargetArn of the selected ruleset should be the same as the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset that is associated with the profile job.

nested_items.name: ValidationMode
nested_items.description: Mode of data quality validation. Default mode is 'CHECK_ALL' which verifies all rules defined in the selected ruleset.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token that you can use in a subsequent call to retrieve the next set of results.
